title: July, 25. 1643. A memento to the Londoners to put them in minde hovv neere their destruction is, and what meanes is left to prevent it.
notes: Urging them to bestir themselves in their own defence.
Signed: Your Friend, and plaine-dealing Remembrancer.
At end: This is licensed and entred into the Hall Booke according to Order.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
